body_html: Actually after merging the autograd refactor we might enable a format that allows calling other functions inside the functions, but in this case it's not very useful anyway. BTW, it might be faster to transpose all dimensions to a format that's accepted by the backend right now and do an inverse transpose them after computing it.
body_text: Actually after merging the autograd refactor we might enable a format that allows calling other functions inside the functions, but in this case it's not very useful anyway. BTW, it might be faster to transpose all dimensions to a format that's accepted by the backend right now and do an inverse transpose them after computing it.
body: Actually after merging the autograd refactor we might enable a format that allows calling other functions inside the functions, but in this case it's not very useful anyway. BTW, it might be faster to transpose all dimensions to a format that's accepted by the backend right now and do an inverse transpose them after computing it.
